title: Custom DNS Server
description: Using a Raspberrypi, I setup a custom dns server for my home network. I used an opensource dns server project called pi-hole which utilizes a blacklist to not serve dns requests from ad servers. This essentially functions as a dns sinkhole and dns level adblocker

title: Dwolla Penetration Test
description: For my senior design project I had the opportunity to perform a black box penetration test of our API and WebAPP. I worked with a team of 6 other students and we found a variety of vulnerabilities with a range of severities. The published vulnerabilities and documentation can be found below.
technologyUsed: Linux, Nmap, OWASP ZAP, BurpSuite, Postman, Python

title: Fud: Android Grocery App
description: Working with a team of 3 other students, we developed an andorid app to track everyday grocery needs. I worked primarly on the backend, setting up account management and http requests to the backend databases.

title: Retropi Arcade
description: Using a pi4 I setup an opensource linux distro called retro pi to serve as the emulator for a homemade arcade machine. I rwired in new buttons and joysticks and even refurbished an arcade cabinet from the 80s to house the electronics.
